  name: "msgbox",
  initialState: {
    open: false,
    message: "",
  },
  reducers: {
    open(state, action) {
      state.open = true;
      state.message = action.payload;
    },
    close(state) {
      state.open = false;
    },
  },
});

export default msgboxSlice;

Reducer ë˜‘ë˜‘í•˜ê²Œ ì‘ì„±í•˜ê¸°(ê°ì²´í™”)

Copy 
const counter = (state = initialState, action) => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case INCREMENT:
      return { ...state, count: state.count + 1 };
    case DECREMENT:
      return { ...state, count: state.count - 1 };
    default:
      return state;
  }
};

ëŒ€ì‹  redux-actions, redux-act, typesafe-actions ë“± ì‚¬ìš© ê°€ëŠ¥

    [INCREMENT]: (state, { payload: null }) => ({
      ...state, count: state.count + 1
    }),
    [DECREMENT]: (state, { payload: null }) => ({
      ...state, count: state.count - 1
    }),
  },
  initialState,
)
